moves.name: Avatar State
moves.description: Aang enters the Avatar State, becoming extremely powerful

moves.name: Tornado Whirl
moves.description: Aang spins a dazzling whirlwind at his opponent

moves.name: Dolphin Spray
moves.description: Aang showers his opponent with a strong burst of water

characters.name: Ty Lee
characters.description: a bit of an airhead but very cheerful and pretty

moves.name: Acrobatics
moves.description: Ty Lee stuns and confuses her opponent with a sequence of acrobatic movements combined with bursts of fire

moves.name: Animal Whisper
moves.description: Ty Lee communicates with animals and has them do her bidding

moves.name: Flaming Cartwheel
moves.description: Ty Lee surrounds her opponent with circles of flame

moves.name: Fire Flips
moves.description: Ty Lee moves swiftly around her opponent, spreading flames across the battle ground

new moves.name: Flaming Cartwheel
new moves.description: Aang surrounds his opponent with circles of flame
